page.title: 09LEISURE IN STOURBRIDGE
page.content: Adjacent to the swimming baths is Bell Street Sports Centre,which was opened in 1974.The facilities include a {sports}hall,an exercise room containing a "multigym",and a rifle and pistol range.A wide variety of indoor sports are available to the Stourbridge public at the sports centre.There are three{recreation} sports fields within the Stourbridge area.These are used by the general public and also by local schools.An eighteen hole{golf}course is situated quite near the centre of Stourbridge.Three beautiful{parks} enable people to enjoy pleasant walks in delightful surroundings.Indeed in Mary Steven's Park there is a large lake with an island in the centre.The island is inhabited by wild ducks.The park also offers facilities such as tennis,bowls and golf.
